title: Behind the Scenes at Eternal Elegance Bridal
excerpt: My unexpected journey into the world of wedding design and the magic that happens behind the scenes at New York's most famous bridal salon.
content:
There's something magical about the moment a bride finds "the dress." That sudden sparkle in her eyes, the way her posture changes, and often, the tears that follow—it's a transformation I've been privileged to witness repeatedly since joining the team at Eternal Elegance Bridal.

Working here has opened my eyes to the intricate art of wedding styling. It's not just about finding a beautiful gown—it's about discovering how fabric, silhouette, and details can express a woman's personality on one of the most significant days of her life.
